word: The Lord has said: "Verily My Sabbaths ye shall keep: for it is a sign between Me and you throughout your generations."  Exodus 31:13. None should disobey His command in order to escape persecution.  But let all consider the words of Christ: "When they persecute you in this city, flee ye into another." Matthew 10:23. If it can be avoided, do not put yourselves into the power of men who are worked by the spirit of antichrist. Everything that we can do should be done that those who are willing to suffer for the truth's sake may be saved from oppression and cruelty.
